name: unalluring
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not attractive or exciting: She had a small flat in one of the more unalluring parts of the town. This book is actually well worth reading if you are not put off by its unalluring title. Opposite
alluring
More examplesFewer examplesThey made me wear an unalluring purple helmet.I find overconfident people like him distinctly unalluring.This club must be one of the most unalluring venues in the entire country.Some of the ingredients have unalluring names such as hydrocinnamic aldehyde and benzyl benzoate.
